name: Welcome teacher
description:
To set the game language

Go to the 'Options', click on the 'Language', and you can play the game in English


Synopsis:

"Newly hired teacher 'Nanuri' is assigned to a peaceful school located in a serene countryside. However, a chilling secret is concealed there.

Every night, enigmatic creatures emerge. Moreover, it appears that the villagers are harboring a secret.

Protagonist 'Nanuri' must confront this mysterious threat, involving discovering clues, tracing the footsteps of both monsters and people, and ultimately unveiling a horrifying truth."
